results.content:
Very informative and thorough course with lots of things that I can apply immediately. 

I gave it the full 5 stars but my only gripe was that I wish we got into the learning aspect a bit earlier. Very minor but I think anyone who buys the course already understands the importance of speed. Other than that, I loved it.

results.content: The course is very detailed and thorough. Highly recommended.

results.content: Excellent course. Cannot wait to implement these techniques into my own site! Application definitely seems overwhelming, but if you comb through the content at your own pace, it is rather easy to follow along.

results.content: There's a lot of very interesting number in here so far, 10% of users lost per second is quite alarming.

results.content:
Great course, gives a solid overview of the subject even for someone with no prior knowledge like my self. It’s very thorough, he clearly knows what he’s talking about and has done is research, also has some good humour smuggled in which helped hold my attention.

I particularly liked how the course takes the time to explain the ‘why’ rather than just the ‘how’ and demonstrates the tangible benefits of improving web performance.

A lot is packed into the 4 hours but it’s paced very well and broken up into easy to digest chunks.

Thanks, looking forward to trying out what I’ve learned in practise, would recommend!
results.content_html:

results.content: Amazing Course! Would def recommend to any dev serious about building better websites which load faster. Luke explains things clearly and breaks up more complicated subjects into smaller parts so you don't get overwhelmed. Thanks!
results.content_html: Amazing Course! Would def recommend to any dev serious about building better websites which load faster. Luke explains things clearly and breaks up more complicated subjects into smaller parts so you don't get overwhelmed. Thanks!

results.content:
This web performance course is well structured and the instructor explains things clearly. In addition to giving me some practical experience optimising a website, it was useful to actually learn why I’m doing it. Too often in web dev you just do things because it’s considered best practice, without really understanding the why.

I’m now looking forward to improving the loading speed of my own website! Thanks Luke! Would recommend!
